title: CatChange
author: CatChange
created_time: June 23, 2022, 10:55:11 AMLast edit: April 09, 2024, 01:46:54 PM by CatChange
content: Hello Bitcointalk!We provide:Crypto to Crypto exchanges(BTC/XMR/ETH/MATIC/TRX/USDT/HNT)Crypto to Fiat exchanges (SEPA/VISA/MC)Fiat to Crypto exchanges (BTC/XMR/ETH/MATIC/TRX/USDT/HNT)Most operations are processed automatically within a matter of minutes.Our Contacts:Mail:info@catchange.meWebsite:https://catchange.meReviews:

comments.author: livingfree
comments.body: I thought that you're like the typical exchange but it seems you're more on a swap/instant exchange.I think you need to improve more with your design. I'm not enticed that you've got a look for a professional exchange/website. Just telling what I feel, I don't have any intention to tell harm to you.But I wish you best of luck with your beginnings.

comments.author: stompix
comments.body: First of all, disable that floating square effect, that thing is good for a kids toystore website, not for an exchange, 10 seconds and it's already annoying.QuoteThe service is based in Europe and meets all legal claims.So this usually means no company, no licenses, just one or two operators doing manual transfers from personal accounts. Since nowhere on that website is a company or an address or anything mentioned, am I right on this one?

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Can you prove that you are a legal company and have a license? I was think that one of the requirements for the license is that you have a headquarters or at least have a website.back to your topic, to succeed, you need several things, the most important of which are:Good exchange rate.Communicate with clients and answer questions.Low fees.To gain trust, you must start escrow P2P sites like LBC/Paxful and over time you will gain trust.

comments.author: LeGaulois
comments.body: Dude, there is something crazy.I tried (since I could have been interested) and for F2F transactions, we need to send bitcoins to the website and then wait to receive an email for an appointment.No way it works like that. You come with the cash and I come with a BTC wallet, we go to the coffee and we make the deal.Not I sent BTC to an unknown person on the web and wait to be contacted hoping to see the person IRL.At the same time, you apparently don't ask us for any personal info (only an email & Telegram ID). If you really have a license in Lithuania (and so a company) you would have no choice but to ask us for our ID to abide by the laws, and at least for the company's accounting.What's the company's number/VAT that I check because I didn't find something with the website's nameQuote from: Husires on June 24, 2022, 12:43:32 PMTo gain trust, you must start escrow P2P sites like LBC/Paxful and over time you will gain trust.To gain trust, he should rather start by displaying the company's name on the website

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: I checked the website it doesn't even have a privacy policy for their customers and the chat box asking for email and phone number you must change it to name only. What I see here is that you are collecting data, phone numbers, and emails and later get spammed with your website?Quote from: stompix on June 24, 2022, 03:54:22 AMFirst of all, disable that floating square effect, that thing is good for a kids toystore website, not for an exchange, 10 seconds and it's already annoying.It's fun when clicking anywhere on the website I spend 15 minutes playing the square effect.

comments.author: TimeTeller
comments.created_time: June 24, 2022, 11:56:11 PMLast edit: June 25, 2022, 12:26:36 AM by TimeTeller
comments.body: Quote from: BitMaxz on June 24, 2022, 11:53:29 PMI checked the website it doesn't even have a privacy policy for their customers and the chat box asking for email and phone number you must change it to name only. What I see here is that you are collecting data, phone numbers, and emails and later get spammed with your website?Quote from: stompix on June 24, 2022, 03:54:22 AMFirst of all, disable that floating square effect, that thing is good for a kids toystore website, not for an exchange, 10 seconds and it's already annoying.It's fun when clicking anywhere on the website I spend 15 minutes playing the square effect. They need to change their requirements here, otherwise, I don't think they can get more traders on their platform.As they are competing with large exchanges like binance, which their p2p services also in terms of fiat,would be hard to earn their reputation in the early days of their business operations.And can the OP link the positive reviews that they are saying on their website?

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: Quote from: TimeTeller on June 24, 2022, 11:56:11 PMAnd can the OP link the positive reviews that they are saying on their website?Actually, all their positive reviews are fake I tried to submit a review from their page but it didn't add on their reviews which I think they have full control of reviews who can add more fake reviews and ignore real people to give real reviews. If they want to gain trust why not, they can get people's trust if there is no content lies on their website and make a campaign(Signature or avatar) here on the forum it can also help them to gain trust.

comments.author: sheenshane
comments.body: On the main page.Quote from: https://catchange.me/"We are always aiming to provide the best rates and also serve exclusive currencies like Monero, Helium and MXC. If you are missing your favourite cryptocurrency, you can ask as to check for the possibility in order to add it to our service."Why not?  The more cryptocurrency options added the more people will choose your exchange.  There's a lot of competition on the p2p exchange I think you must have something interesting. I think also there should be a Frequently Ask Question (FAQ) button on your site, aside from "site rules" button that is supposedly commonly known "Term of Use" (TOS).Quote from: BitMaxz on June 24, 2022, 11:53:29 PMIt's fun when clicking anywhere on the website I spend 15 minutes playing the square effect. Lol me too.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: So according to whois, you registered your domain on 2022-03-29 and then the very next day or even within hours, someone used your service and made a review that you are superb?Do you think we can really believe such fake reviews?

comments.author: CatChange
comments.created_time: August 01, 2022, 10:15:59 AMLast edit: August 09, 2022, 11:03:51 AM by CatChange
comments.body: Quote from: stompix on June 24, 2022, 03:54:22 AMFirst of all, disable that floating square effect, that thing is good for a kids toystore website, not for an exchange, 10 seconds and it's already annoying.QuoteThe service is based in Europe and meets all legal claims.So this usually means no company, no licenses, just one or two operators doing manual transfers from personal accounts. Since nowhere on that website is a company or an address or anything mentioned, am I right on this one?You should check our websites Footer or the initial post which contains information on the company, registered in Lithuania and authorised to process crypto payments.Quote from: LeGaulois on June 24, 2022, 09:35:23 PMDude, there is something crazy.I tried (since I could have been interested) and for F2F transactions, we need to send bitcoins to the website and then wait to receive an email for an appointment.No way it works like that. You come with the cash and I come with a BTC wallet, we go to the coffee and we make the deal.Not I sent BTC to an unknown person on the web and wait to be contacted hoping to see the person IRL.At the same time, you apparently don't ask us for any personal info (only an email & Telegram ID). If you really have a license in Lithuania (and so a company) you would have no choice but to ask us for our ID to abide by the laws, and at least for the company's accounting.What's the company's number/VAT that I check because I didn't find something with the website's nameTo gain trust, he should rather start by displaying the company's name on the websiteHello, you should check the initial post or the websites footer, all legal information is included.Quote from: TimeTeller on June 24, 2022, 11:56:11 PMThey need to change their requirements here, otherwise, I don't think they can get more traders on their platform.As they are competing with large exchanges like binance, which their p2p services also in terms of fiat,would be hard to earn their reputation in the early days of their business operations.And can the OP link the positive reviews that they are saying on their website?Our positive reviews are either posted through our website or forwarded from sources like trustpilot or one of the exchange monitors, linked in the initial posts review section.Quote from: BitMaxz on June 25, 2022, 11:18:14 PMActually, all their positive reviews are fake I tried to submit a review from their page but it didn't add on their reviews which I think they have full control of reviews who can add more fake reviews and ignore real people to give real reviews. If they want to gain trust why not, they can get people's trust if there is no content lies on their website and make a campaign(Signature or avatar) here on the forum it can also help them to gain trust.Hello, you should better double check, before you post such serious accusations. Of course we did not approve your review, as you are not a customer of our service in any way. This should be obviously.Quote from: sheenshane on June 25, 2022, 11:56:40 PMOn the main page.Quote from: https://catchange.me/"We are always aiming to provide the best rates and also serve exclusive currencies like Monero, Helium and MXC. If you are missing your favourite cryptocurrency, you can ask as to check for the possibility in order to add it to our service."Why not?  The more cryptocurrency options added the more people will choose your exchange.  There's a lot of competition on the p2p exchange I think you must have something interesting. I think also there should be a Frequently Ask Question (FAQ) button on your site, aside from "site rules" button that is supposedly commonly known "Term of Use" (TOS).Hello, thanks for your interest in our service!We do provide an FAQ section:https://catchange.me/faq/

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: CatChange on August 01, 2022, 10:15:59 AMOur positive reviews are either posted through our website or forwarded from sources like trustpilot or one of the exchange monitors, linked in the initial posts review section.To be honest, you shouldn't brag about current reviews. some of those exchanger monitors don't even have anything about you, and where there are, they all look fake. Even on Trustpilot. I would certainly not base marketing strategy on the mandatory forcing of positive reviews, there are other ways.have you considered starting a review campaign here, where you will pay users to test your platform and write honest feedback about the service?

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: these colors on your site are weird, you need to ask a web designer for advice about the best color combinations for the type of site you are running, because these current colors are not good.another point why don't you add paypal? I think it would be very goodYou can also be on the bike at https://www.bestchange.com it would be a good move you would make. this way people could have a place to complain if you didn't provide good service and it would bring more confidence to your site

comments.author: Katateh
comments.body: The application is processed by the operator all night. I do not recommend the exchanger to those who need to quickly exchange money.The application is still being processed. I don't know when I will receive my money. Support freezes.

comments.author: CatChange
comments.body: Quote from: Katateh on August 02, 2022, 09:50:01 AMThe application is processed by the operator all night. I do not recommend the exchanger to those who need to quickly exchange money.The application is still being processed. I don't know when I will receive my money. Support freezes.Hello, i do not see your order in our system. Also we had no support requests with such inquiry.Please provide detailed information about your case to our customer-support.Thank you very much.
